name: PICO-8 Bad Apple Demo
description:
A Bad Apple! demo running at 64x64 pixels at 30fps on PICO-8.

Currently the video stops ~2/3rds through due to data limitations. Still working on improving the compression.

Original Song: ZUN + nomico.

Arrangement for PICO-8: Josiah Winslow - https://winslowjosiah.itch.io/

Original video: Anira - https://www.nicovideo.jp/watch/sm8628149
